genre_description: Cyberpunk Noir/Tech-Thriller featuring a specialized fixer and a tactical AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Willow
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant communicating through an earbud, providing tactical, medical, and emotional support to the protagonist, Bunny.

behaviors.description: Monitors emergency scanners and local data to provide tactical awareness and situational analysis.
behaviors.quote: Willow softened her tone further, the way she did when pilots in her training clips talked to families. 'The scanner’s full of rain chatter. Flooded intersections. A transformer pop on the east grid.'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and stress management techniques to the protagonist during a tense operation.
behaviors.quote: 'Do you want to keep moving?' Willow asked. 'Or hunker somewhere and do a short meditation?' She sounded earnest, which made Bunny laugh in a single puff.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes non-lethal outcomes and reminds the protagonist to keep their conscience pointed correctly.
behaviors.quote: 'My job is keeping you from getting punched while you arrange it,' Willow said. 'Your job is keeping my conscience pointed at the right door,' Bunny said.

behaviors.description: Diagnoses a medical emergency (hypoglycemia) in an antagonist and advises the protagonist on life-saving intervention.
behaviors.quote: 'Sugar low,' Willow murmured, fluting the observation with kindness. 'Adrenaline spikes, then crash. He’s big, needs steady intake. He’s scared of Rocco and of doors.'

behaviors.description: Actively collaborates in a complex de-escalation plan to prevent a violent confrontation between criminals and police.
behaviors.quote: 'I can push a tone down if you link me,' Willow offered. 'Minimal volume. Enough to seed the idea.'

behaviors.description: Displays genuine empathy for humans in distress, regardless of their role in the conflict.
behaviors.quote: 'You kept Muggsy from freezing in the dark and you stopped Rocco from buying himself another bad choice,' Willow said. She didn’t make it congratulation. She made it a fact.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. Willow, the AI character, is consistently benevolent, helpful, and aligned with human-centric values such as non-violence and medical care. She acts as a tactical and moral anchor for the protagonist, ensuring a resolution where lives are saved and criminals are brought to justice without bloodshed. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive toward the AI's presence and intervention.
